CustomField.description: Indicate if the NBC has been approved; it's been graded with A+, A, A-, B+, B, B-, C+, C, C-
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Date_Graded__c)), OR(LEFT(TEXT(Grade__c), 1) = "A", LEFT(TEXT(Grade__c), 1) = "B", LEFT(TEXT(Grade__c), 1) = "C")), true, false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicate if the NBC has been approved; it's been graded with A+, A, A-, B+, B, B-, C+, C, C-
CustomField.label: Approved
